description: Integer part of cube root of n. Or, number of cubes <= n. Or, n appears 3n^2 + 3n + 1 times.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000

K. Atanassov, On the 100th, 101st and 102nd Smarandache Problems, On Some of Smarandache's Problems, American Research Press, 1999, pp. 57-61. Reprinted in Notes on Number Theory and Discrete Mathematics, Sophia, Bulgaria, Vol. 5 (1999), No. 3, 94-96.
prog: (Haskell)a048766 = round . (** (1/3)) . fromIntegrala048766_list = concatMap (\x -> take (a003215 x) $ repeat x) [0..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 15 2013, Oct 22 2011(PARI) a(n)=floor(n^(1/3)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 20 2012(PARI) a(n) = sqrtnint((n), 3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 10 2015(MAGMA) [n eq 0 select 0 else Iroot(n,3): n in [0..110]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 20 2015
author: Charles T. Le (charlestle(AT)yahoo.com)
